metadata.name: Jamp Calcium Polystyrene Sulfonate 5 g Powder for suspension

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used to treat abnormally high potassium levels

contraindications.disease: Overdose symptoms may include confusion irritability trouble thinking or concentrating muscle weakness or trouble breathing
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Polystyrene sulfonate affects the exchange of sodium and potassium in the body Polystyrene sulfonate is used to treat high levels of potassium in the blood also called hyperkalemia It is a potassium binding ion exchange resin that can be administered orally 25 grams in 20 sorbitol or rectally 50 grams in 20 sorbitol

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Tolevamer is combined with Magnesium oxide
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Tolevamer is combined with Sodium bicarbonate
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Tolevamer is combined with Aluminum hydroxide
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Tolevamer is combined with Calcium carbonate
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Tolevamer is combined with Magaldrate

The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Tolevamer is combined with Magnesium trisilicate
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Tolevamer is combined with Magnesium carbonate

The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Tolevamer is combined with Hydrotalcite

The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Tolevamer is combined with Almasilate
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Tolevamer is combined with Aluminium glycinate

The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Tolevamer is combined with Calcium silicate
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Tolevamer is combined with Aluminium phosphate
Tolevamer can cause a decrease in the absorption of Thyrotropin alfa resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy
Tolevamer can cause a decrease in the absorption of Liothyronine resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy
Tolevamer can cause a decrease in the absorption of Levothyroxine resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy
Tolevamer can cause a decrease in the absorption of Liotrix resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy
Tolevamer can cause a decrease in the absorption of Tiratricol resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy
Tolevamer can cause a decrease in the absorption of Thyroid porcine resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy
The risk or severity of Cardiac Arrhythmia can be increased when Tolevamer is combined with Digoxin

The risk or severity of Cardiac Arrhythmia can be increased when Tolevamer is combined with Acetyldigoxin
The risk or severity of Cardiac Arrhythmia can be increased when Tolevamer is combined with Peruvoside
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Meloxicam is combined with Tolevamer
The absorption of Lithium citrate can be decreased when combined with Tolevamer
The absorption of Lithium carbonate can be decreased when combined with Tolevamer
The absorption of Lithium hydroxide can be decreased when combined with Tolevamer
